definitions.definition: A windstorm of limited extent, such as a tornado , dust devil , or waterspout , characterized by an inward spiral motion of the air with an upward current in the center; a vortex of air.
A person or body of objects or events sweeping violently onward.
examples: Once he got that new scooter he turned into a whirlwind and damaged all the flowers.
The weeks leading up to the convention were a whirlwind of preparation and hurried activity.

main_definition: A windstorm of limited extent, such as a tornado , dust devil , or waterspout , characterized by an inward spiral motion of the air with an upward current in the center; a vortex of air.
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) A person or body of objects or events sweeping violently onward.
